name: Chemin de fer: prolongation de l’application de mesures temporaires concernant la tarification de l’infrastructure ferroviaire - COVID-19 - Rail: prolongation of temporary levying of charges - COVID-19 - Eisenbahn: Verlängerung der befristeten Erhebung von Entgelten – COVID-19 - - Proposition de la Commission
title: Duration of the reference period for the application of temporary measures concerning the levying of charges for the use of railway infrastructure
